casebody.data:
Morile GUERET, Appellant, v. Clem P. PERRIN, Sr., et al., Appellees. No. 18231. United States Court of Appeals Fifth Circuit. June 9, 1960. John E. Jackson, Jr., New Orleans, La., for appellant. Marcel Livaudais, Jr., New Orleans, La., for appellees.

Before TUTTLE, CAMERON and WISDOM, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

We have carefully considered this appeal. We are of the opinion that the judgment of the District Court should be

Affirmed.
